utils¶

utils.data¶

utils.data.read()[source]¶

Read lyrics data from saved folder.

Returns:a list of string 
['天青色 等烟雨\n而我在等你', '故事的小黄花\n从出生那年就飘着']

utils.doc¶

class utils.doc.Doc(lyric, depth=0, tokenizer='word')[source]¶

Bases: object

Operate lyrics as documents.

Use Doc.load_corpus(lyrics) to initialize the corpus.

from utils import Doc, read
dev_lyrcs = read()[:500]
Doc.load_corpus(dev_lyrics)

In case you have to create an instance, use Doc(lyric, depth, tokenizer).

Hierarchy in the lyric will be parsed(recursively) and can be accessed by doc.get_children().

Parameters:
  • lyric – a piece of lyric, list of sentence
  • depth – used internally for hierarchy, default to 0
  • tokenizer – the tokenizer(char/word), default to word
 
Doc(lyric='Hello world\nGoodbye world', tokenizer='word')
classmethod load_corpus(lyrics, vocab_size=10000, unk_percentage=0.08, tokenizer='word')[source]¶

Load from lyrics read by utils.data.read()

Parameters:
  • lyrics (list) – a list of original lyrics texts
  • vocab_size (int) – the vocabulary size
  • unk_percentage (float) – maximum percentage of unknown token in a doc
  • tokenizer (str, optional) – char / word, defaults to ‘word’
classmethod get_corpus()[source]¶
Returns:The list of the Doc() instances created by load_corpus()
classmethod get_vocab()[source]¶
Returns:the vocabulary dict of the corpus.
classmethod idxs_to_text(idxs)[source]¶

Return the text of idxs.

Convert a numpy array to a sentence. Or a list of numpy arrays to a piece of lyrics

Parameters:idxs – a numpy array or a list of numpy array 
doc = Doc.get_corpus()[0]
print(Doc.idxs_to_text(doc.get_bag()))
print(Doc.idxs_to_text(doc.get_lines()))
get_origin()[source]¶
Returns:the original text of this doc
get_bag()[source]¶
Returns:a list(bag) of indexs(int) of this doc
get_lines()[source]¶
Returns:a list of list(bag) of indexs(int) in the lyrics.
embedding()[source]¶
Returns:embedding of the doc as bag of words using pre-trained model.
similarity(doc2)[source]¶
Returns:the cosine distance between two lines.
classmethod dump()[source]¶

Save everything and next time use load() instead of load_corpus() to save time!!

classmethod load()[source]¶

Load things back!!
